page.title: 14Spare time activities
page.content: The most popular activities of 11 year olds studied at West Hill were watching T.V. and listening to music. These are closely followed by reading and drawing Nature Study, Particularly of birds and animals of nearby Cannock Chase and walking with friends are also popular leisure pursuits. Going to local discos,usually at school or the local social club is popular with both boys and girls.Most children have favourite pop music groups and spend a lot of time listening and dancing to records and the radio.Playing and watching sports,particularly football and cricket are keenly persued by the boys. Other activities include Clubs, such as Boys Brigade,Cubs and Guides.Collecting items such as posters or rubbers and fishing are popular hobbies. Quieter activities such as writing and computer games are becoming very popular.
